category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_saved_modified_file_option
preference.preference_description: Set the CATIA_saved_modified_file_option preference to true to only save modified files or to false to save both modified and unmodified files. This preference has an interaction on the Force Save Unmodified files button in the Save Manager and is also taken into account during batch processes.
